languages.text: "Благодарю, Лорд-капитан. Я живу ради них, и благодаря вам самые важные для меня люди в порядке".
"Thank you, Lord Captain. They're all I live for, and, thanks to you, the people most important to me are now safe."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю, Лорд-капитан. Я живу ради них, и благодаря вам самые важные для меня люди в порядке".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. They're all I live for, and thanks to you, the people most important to me are now safe."
"Thank you, Lord Captain. They're all I live for, and thanks to you, the people most important to me are now safe."
"Thank you, Lord Captain. They're all I live for, and, thanks to you, the people most important to me are now safe."
"Thank you, Lord Captain. They're all I live for, and, thanks to you, the people most important to me are now safe."
"Thank you, Lord Captain. They're all I live for, and, thanks to you, the people most important to me are now safe."
"Thank you, Lord Captain. They're all I live for, and, thanks to you, the people most important to me are now safe."

languages.text: « Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Elles sont ma seule raison de vivre, et grâce à vous, les deux personnes les plus chères à mon cœur sont à présent hors de danger. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. They're all I live for, and, thanks to you, the people most important to me are now safe."

traits.locale_text: « Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Elles sont ma seule raison de vivre, et grâce à vous, les deux personnes les plus chères à mon cœur sont à présent hors de danger. »

languages.text: «Gracias, Lord Capitán. Son mi razón de ser y ahora, gracias a usted, la gente más importante para mí está a salvo».
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. They're all I live for, and, thanks to you, the people most important to me are now safe."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias, Lord Capitán. Son mi razón de ser y ahora, gracias a usted, la gente más importante para mí está a salvo».

languages.text: “谢谢您，舰长大人，她们就是我人生的意义。多亏了您，我最重要的人都安然无恙。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. They're all I live for, and, thanks to you, the people most important to me are now safe."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢您，舰长大人，她们就是我人生的意义。多亏了您，我最重要的人都安然无恙。”

languages.text: 「ありがとうございます、ロード・キャプテン。私はあなたの為に、そしてあなたのお陰で生きています。そして私にとって最も大切な人々は、安全なんです」
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. They're all I live for, and, thanks to you, the people most important to me are now safe."

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとうございます、ロード・キャプテン。私はあなたの為に、そしてあなたのお陰で生きています。そして私にとって最も大切な人々は、安全なんです」

languages.text: "Danke, Lord Captain. Sie sind mein Lebensinhalt, und dank Euch sind die Leute, die mir am wichtigsten sind, nun in Sicherheit."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. They're all I live for, and, thanks to you, the people most important to me are now safe."

traits.locale_text: "Danke, Lord Captain. Sie sind mein Lebensinhalt, und dank Euch sind die Leute, die mir am wichtigsten sind, nun in Sicherheit."

languages.text: "Teşekkür ederim Lord Kaptan. Onlar benim yaşama nedenim. Sayenizde en değer verdiğim insanlar artık güvende."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. They're all I live for, and, thanks to you, the people most important to me are now safe."
